Package backend.tradesystem.managers

Class TradingInfoManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.managers.Manager
backend.tradesystem.managers.TradingInfoManager
public class TradingInfoManager
extends Manager
Handles anything about getting info on trading and on traders, but this does not handle trading itself

  • Constructor Summary

    Initialize the objects to get items from databases

    Making the database objects with set file paths

    • TradingInfoManager

      public TradingInfoManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database

    • TradingInfoManager

      public TradingInfoManager​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path

    • searchTrader

      public java.util.ArrayList<Trader> searchTrader​(java.lang.String name)
      Return traders that contain name
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search for
      Returns:
      traders with similar names

    • getAllTradersInCity

      public java.util.ArrayList<Trader> getAllTradersInCity​(java.lang.String city)
      Gets all the traders within the same city
      Parameters:
      city - the city name
      Returns:
      list of all traders within the same city

    • getTradableItemsWithName

      public TradableItem[] getTradableItemsWithName​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets tradable items that has the name substring within the input name string For example, if the item name is "Apple Pie", and the name to check for is "apple", then that TradableItem is included as a list of items to return
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check for
      Returns:
      list of tradable items that match the name

    • getTraderThatHasTradableItemId

      public Trader getTraderThatHasTradableItemId​(java.lang.String id) throws TradableItemNotFoundException
      Gets the trader that has the tradable item id
      Parameters:
      id - the tradable item id
      Returns:
      the trader
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - if the item id is invalid

    • getRecentTraders

      public java.util.ArrayList<Trader> getRecentTraders​(java.lang.String traderId) throws AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, TradeNotFoundException
      return the 3 most recent traders that this trader has traded with.
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader being checked for
      Returns:
      a Trader array list of the 3 most recently traded with Traders
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - trader is not allowed to know the frequent traders
      UserNotFoundException - user not found
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found

    • getFrequentTraders

      public java.util.ArrayList<Trader> getFrequentTraders​(java.lang.String traderId) throws AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, TradeNotFoundException
      Return the 3 most frequent traders that this trader has traded with.
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader being checked for
      Returns:
      a Trader array list of the 3 most frequently traded with Traders
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - trader is not allowed to know the frequent traders
      UserNotFoundException - user not found
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found

    • getRecentTradeItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<TradableItem> getRecentTradeItems​(java.lang.String traderId) throws AuthorizationException, TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Gets a list of the items used in trades
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      Returns:
      list of tradable items that were recently traded
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - trader not allowed to get recently traded items
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found
      UserNotFoundException - trader id is bad
      TradableItemNotFoundException - tradable item is not found

    • suggestLend

      public java.util.ArrayList<TradableItem> suggestLend​(java.lang.String thisTraderId, java.lang.String otherTraderId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Used for suggesting what items that otherTrader will want from thisTrader based on the wishlist
      Parameters:
      thisTraderId - the trader that wants to know what otherTrader will want
      otherTraderId - the other trader
      Returns:
      list of items that otherTrader will want
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - thisTrader isn't allowed to get suggestions
      TradableItemNotFoundException - if the tradable item isn't found

    • suggestTrade

      public java.util.HashMap<TradableItem,​TradableItem> suggestTrade​(java.lang.String trader1, java.lang.String trader2) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Suggests all item trades that can be done between two users
      Parameters:
      trader1 - is the id of this trader
      trader2 - is the trader this trader wants to trade with
      Returns:
      a hashmap of the items that can be traded between two users (key is your item to lend, value the item to borrow)
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - bad trader ids
      AuthorizationException - can't suggest because user is not a trader or is frozen
      TradableItemNotFoundException - a tradable item wasn't found
